correlations.description: Both threat models identify unauthorized access as a critical threat, highlighting the risk of compromised control planes.

correlations.compliance_implications: Strengthening access controls aligns with compliance requirements for data protection regulations such as GDPR and HIPAA.

correlations.compliance_implications: Aligning with CSA guidelines supports compliance with various regulatory frameworks, enhancing overall security governance.

correlations.description: Both models highlight the risks associated with misconfigured firewall rules, which can lead to unauthorized access and data breaches.

recommended_actions.action: Implement automated tools for continuous firewall configuration monitoring

correlations.compliance_implications: Regular reviews and monitoring align with compliance requirements for maintaining secure network configurations.
